DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics anti-viral activity JTK-853 hepatitis C virus genotype 1 infected subject base reduction viral load ( HCV RNA level ) baseline end treatment , follow genotypic resistance monitor one year study drug treatment .
